title: Nobody Tosses a Dwarf (1R23)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, make an opponent discard 3 cards from the top of his or her draw deck.
Lore:	”'My folk have never had dealings with any of the servants of the Enemy.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Version: +.
